sentences.english: He was getting through games last season on painkilling injections.
sentences.chinese: 去季他都是在注射止痛劑的情況下堅持上場的。

sentences.english: It macerates its opium and percolates its own laudanum and paregoric.
sentences.chinese: 它泡軟鴉片，過濾自己的鴉片酊和止痛劑。

sentences.english: Hypnosis could be used alone for pain relief or as an add-on to facilitate and enhance other analgesics.
sentences.chinese: 催眠可單獨運用於止痛或者是促進其他止痛劑的療效。

sentences.english: Their use therefore requires either pain-killing medications anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 因而它們的使用需要止痛劑或麻醉劑。

sentences.english: Demonstrate appropriate use of analgesics and sedatives in trauma patients.
sentences.chinese: 示範在外傷患者身上能夠適當的使用止痛劑與鎮定劑。
